duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop facility-based strategies to reduce supply expense per adjusted admission.
Identify and implement supply expense margin improvement with a focus on high-cost departments.
Participate in monthly operating reports and supply expense planning.
Facilitate value analysis meetings and review products for clinical evidence and benefit.
Build relationships with hospital leadership, physicians, and supply chain to implement cost containment processes.
Conduct financial analysis of quantitative and qualitative information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required (Business, Health Administration, Nursing, Pharmacy or other Allied Health Profession) or a graduate of a Professional school of Nursing (Associate Degree or Diploma) with related experiences in healthcare value analysis, clinical supply chain, or acute care hospital performance
